name: Great White Shark Survival
description:
The Great White Shark is the ocean's apex predator. Now you control his destiny as you try and survive against, octopus, stingrays, Orca, seagulls, sea turtles, and dolphins. Attack everything the ocean throws your way. This high action shark simulator is packed with adventure. The object of the game is to search and rescue all four members of your great white family and defeat all 5 enemy bosses. Explore all corners of the map to locate the other sharks.

Top Game Features:
--Huge Open World 3D Ocean Map with Beaches, Islands, Reefs, and Caves.
--5 Enemy Bosses to defeat 
--Rescue all 4 Members of your family
 --Upgrade your Shark Strength, Stamina, and Swim Speed.
 --Call your family for help to defeat the giant boss animals 
--Beautiful Hawaiian setting with 4 times of day plus weather

This animal simulator has been designed for all ages. Don't forget to upgrade your animal! Go go for the easy fish.

Please check out our other free 3D animal sims. https://www.facebook.com/wildfootgames
